Title: Toddlers understand more than you think. I was listing things to my 1 yo like "do you want water", "...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Toddlers understand more than you think. I was listing things to my 1 yo like "do you want water", "do you want to read a book"... and he kept saying NOO. And I thought it was just because he liked saying no but then I said "do you want on my shoulders" and he said "da"
